about_the_game:
Welcome to the Unfinished Game™ Testing facility! As our new tester, you will have to make your way through a series of unexpected experiments in this first-person adventure. Small puzzles, platforming, meta gameplay and a group of silly NPC awaits you in this unpredictable factory.

The goal? Succesfully finish all tests so that we'll finally be able to release this "Unfinished Game" of ours!

One thing for sure, expect only the unexpected in here!



What you will find:

  • Simple puzzles
  • Platforming
  • Physics based elements
  • Other testing bot eager to talk with you
  • Some bugs (voluntary..?)
  • Collectables
  • Easter eggs
  • Unintentional features
  • And of course, silliness

name: An Unfinished Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
